taisun-proxy.description: TAISUN Proxy MCP (single entrypoint). Router+Memory+Chrome skills+Skillize+Supervisor.

youtube.description: YouTube downloader - download subtitles from YouTube videos

context7.description: Context7 - Up-to-date documentation for LLMs. Fetches current docs and code examples to prevent hallucinated APIs.
